sections.purpose: To accurately measure time intervals for extraction, drying, and other timed procedures.
sections.scope: Applicable to all timed operations in Pharmacognosy practicals and research.
procedure: Set the desired countdown or count-up time using the appropriate buttons.
Start the timer at the beginning of the operation.
Monitor the display and respond promptly to the alarm at the end of the period.
Record the exact duration in the experimental notebook if needed.
Reset the timer before the next use.
precautions: Confirm the timer mode (count-up or countdown) before starting.
Ensure the alarm volume is audible in the working area.
Replace batteries as soon as low battery indicators appear.
Protect the device from spills and high humidity.
Use multiple timers for complex multi-step procedures when required.
